creditline: Gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
dimension: 29 x 20 in. (73.66 x 50.8 cm) (sheet, as printed)
text: This artwork is part of the series COVID-19: Labor Camp Report. Artist's statement on this artwork originally published on the @laborcamp Instagram account: My classes started, and I consider myself extremely lucky that neither I, nor my students need to be on campus physically. If meat packing plants were the special virus spreading sites in the early days of pandemic, then schools are the superspreaders today. It didn’t need to be this way.
title: September 9, 2020: U of C
